## Example Random Samples

```{r, random-sample}
set.seed(20150516)

x <- rbinom(n = 100, size = 1, prob = 0.5)
samples_ls <- list(
  n5   = x[1:5],
  n15  = x[1:15],
  n30  = x[1:30],
  n100 = x
)

rm(x)
```

```{r}
#| label: random-sample-hist
#| fig-show: "hold"

par(mfrow = c(2, 2))

hist(samples_ls$n5)
hist(samples_ls$n15)
hist(samples_ls$n30)
hist(samples_ls$n100)

par(mfrow = c(1, 1))
```
